name: md-reader-pro
description: Enterprise-grade markdown editor with Cathedral features: auto-save, undo/redo, live stats, export, and more!

scripts.dev: cross-env FORCE_COLOR= NO_COLOR= webpack serve --config webpack.config.cjs --mode development
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:performance && npm run test:benchmarks
scripts.performance:budget:check: npm run build && npm run performance:budget
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.validate:clean: npm run lint:clean && npm run test && npm run build:clean
scripts.validate:full: npm run lint && npm run test:all && npm run build
scripts.validate:production: npm run validate:full && npx playwright test tests/e2e/production-coverage-simple.spec.js
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env FORCE_COLOR= NO_COLOR= npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:trace-warnings: cross-env FORCE_COLOR= NO_COLOR= NODE_OPTIONS=--trace-warnings npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:headed: cross-env FORCE_COLOR= NO_COLOR= PLAYWRIGHT_HEADED=1 npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:watch: cross-env FORCE_COLOR= NO_COLOR= PLAYWRIGHT_HEADED=1 npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: cross-env FORCE_COLOR= NO_COLOR= npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e:smoke: cross-env FORCE_COLOR= NO_COLOR= npx playwright test tests/e2e/smoke-e2e.spec.cjs
scripts.test:e2e:smoke:dist: npm run build && cross-env FORCE_COLOR= NO_COLOR= PLAYWRIGHT_SERVE_DIST=1 npx playwright test tests/e2e/smoke-e2e.spec.cjs
scripts.production:validate: npm run build && npm run production:checklist
scripts.production:checklist: echo 'Manual production validation checklist - see PRODUCTION_TESTING_STRATEGY.md'
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build && npm run deploy:prepare
scripts.deploy:validate-full: npm run validate:full && npm run deploy:build
scripts.pages:setup: echo 'Setting up GitHub Pages - see GITHUB_PAGES_SETUP.md for instructions'
